title: Fan Artist Feature - Rin The Yordle

replies.body: Eeeeeee! Thank you so much for this! ^__^ And hi guys! Seriously, I'm enamored with this community every time. I'm so honored to be making fan art for everyone, and hope to continue this for a long time!

> [{quoted}](name=RinTheYordle,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=EjtEUN3z,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-16T19:11:22.798+0000)
>
> Eeeeeee! Thank you so much for this! ^__^ And hi guys! Seriously, I'm enamored with this community every time. I'm so honored to be making fan art for everyone, and hope to continue this for a long time!

Hey i just really wanted to know what you use for your art. is it 100% comuter or do you do the Lining on paper and scan it in or is it all on paper. I do a lot of concept for anime and am going to school for graphic design so that i may make concepts for games :) If you use a program what is your preference and what hardware do you reccomend?

Hey there! I am completely digital right now, but I do some doodles on paper. Whatever you are comfortable with, DO IT. Traditional is JUST AS GOOD by itself and a GREAT medium to mix with digital. Play with it and have fun!

I would recommend learning photoshop. They have an awesome pay by month program now that makes it a lot cheaper to own the product, or, if you want a cheaper route, go with Paint Tool SAI. It is STRICTLY for painting though. It doesn't have a text feature in it (yet? at least on my old version it doesn't). I wouldn't recommend SAI for making graphic design stuff. It can do it, but photoshop has an easier time of making these things. :)

Good luck with your endeavors and in school! Work hard and practice all the time, you'll get there! o/
Love your work, now all u gotta do is draw  {{champion:150}} with them XD
YEAH I need to do a new "All the yordles" art! I made that JUST before Gnar came out. SAD FACE.
Oh also cause I'm a derp, I have a deviantart! RinTheYordle.deviantart.com. :) Feel free to say hi there, too!

I'm not sure! The guys have been very busy, but Im hoping to be around a bit to say hi again soon! Who knows :D

I'm super happy you like them! Especially enough to have it as your BG! And TOTALLY, I love making league fan art. Especially hearing this kind of feedback. It makes everything worth it. SO MUCH.

Ah! That is my OC, Rin. That drawing was a commission for someone who asked to put Rin, his OC yordle, and his friends OC yordle in the drawing. So I did all of them +those 3 but was still pretty proud of the piece :D

She's just an assistant to him at the academy. Fun little thing I came up with years ago.
